Usage:

1. In class where Efuelite File Logger is to be used, just import the name space "EfueliteSolutionsFileLogger".
2. To log an information, just call FileLogger.Write(information to log);
3. To read information from logs, just call FileLogger.Read(true/false);  this function takes a boolean value . If true, then the logs will be 
deleted after been read.
4. 3. To delete logs, just call FileLogger.Delete();
